snippet: Montee Ball sustained a concussion and injuries to his face after being attacked by a group of five men near the university’s campus.
abstract: Wisconsin’s star running back Montee Ball, a leading contender for this season’s Heisman Trophy, sustains a concussion and injuries to his face after being attacked by a group of five men near the university’s campus.
lead_paragraph: Montee Ball sustained a concussion and injuries to his face after being attacked by a group of five men near the university’s campus.

headline.seo: Wisconsin’s Montee Ball Is Injured in Assault
headline.main: Star Running Back for Wisconsin Is Injured in Assault
headline.print_headline: Star Running Back for Wisconsin Is Injured in Assault
